text: Stephen Yang Xiangtai (; 3 January 1923 â€“ 13 October 2021) was a Chinese Roman Catholic prelate. He was Bishop Coadjutor and a Diocesan Bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Daming from 1999 until 2016. Yang was born in village Gaocun, Hunan. He became a priest in 1949. Yang died on 13 October 2021 at the age of 98 in a hospital in Handan, Hebie, China. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Hunan
title: Stephen Yang Xiangtai
